question: Suppose -32 = 2*j - 6*j. Let g(f) = -11*f**2 + 17*f + 2. Let b(w) = 7*w**2 - 11*w - 1. Determine j*b(i) + 5*g(i).
Let m(i) = i + 1. Let d(a) = 2*a**2 + 5*a + 2. Determine d(g) - 3*m(g).
Let j(x) = 6*x + 10. Let v(p) = -3*p**3 - p**2 - p. Let u be v(-1). Let s = 183 - 193. Let o(l) = 2*l + 3. Determine s*o(a) + u*j(a).
Let d(m) = 2*m**2 + m + 4. Let u(i) = i**2 + i + 1. Calculate d(w) - 3*u(w).
Let q(l) be the second derivative of 3*l**5/20 - 17*l**4/12 + 2*l**3/3 + 9*l**2/2 + 2*l - 45. Let c(t) = t**3 - 4*t**2 + t + 2. Calculate 9*c(m) - 2*q(m).
Suppose -3*m = -3*d - 24, -3*m = 7*d - 3*d + 25. Let o(p) = p**2 + 9*p - 8. Let b be o(d). Let k(s) = 2*s. Let z(w) = 21*w + 1. Determine b*k(a) + 2*z(a).
Let y(q) = q**2 + 1. Let x(r) = 2*r**3 - 9*r**2 - 7. Calculate x(c) + 6*y(c).
Let k(w) = 2*w**2 - 2. Let f(c) be the first derivative of c**3/3 - c + 28. Suppose 0 = -b + 3*y + 10, -8*b - 5 = -4*b - 3*y. Calculate b*f(o) + 2*k(o).
Let u(j) = 2*j - 3*j + 2 - 3 + 2. Suppose 0 = l + l + 5*b - 5, 3*b - 3 = -2*l. Let w = -3 + l. Let d(p) = -p**3 - 3*p + 3. Determine w*u(i) + d(i).
Let j(b) = -b - 1. Let t(i) = -i**3 - 9*i - 5. Calculate -18*j(c) + 2*t(c).
Let j(h) be the second derivative of -h**2 + 1/6*h**4 + 1/10*h**5 + 2*h + 0 - 2/3*h**3. Let k(a) = -a**2 + a + 1. Calculate -j(y) - 4*k(y).
Let k(y) = -8*y**2 + 4*y + 2. Let c(f) = 4*f**2 - 2*f - 1. Determine -7*c(p) - 3*k(p).
Let f(r) = -2*r + 4*r + r**2 + r**2 + 3*r. Let i(v) = -v. Give -f(p) - 5*i(p).
Let r(w) = w - 5. Let v(c) = -1. Calculate r(u) - 4*v(u).
Let m(a) = -a**2 - a. Let p(d) = 3*d**2 + 28*d. Calculate -2*m(f) - p(f).
Let w(m) = -m**2 + 2*m. Let c(l) = -l + 21. Let u be c(16). Let s(i) = 3*i**2 - 5*i. What is u*w(f) + 2*s(f)?
Let a(j) = 2*j**3 - 3*j. Let h(x) = -4*x**3 + 5*x. Suppose -3*m + 5*p + 4 - 34 = 0, -2*m - 4*p = -2. Calculate m*a(f) - 3*h(f).
Let z(q) be the second derivative of -q**4/12 + q**3/2 + q**2 - 9*q. Let s(j) = 2*j + 3 + j**2 - j - 2. What is s(m) - z(m)?
Let n(w) = -w. Let x(r) = 6*r - 5. Let k(p) = n(p) - x(p). Let b(a) = a. Let v(i) = 26*i - 14. Let y(q) = -6*b(q) + v(q). Calculate 14*k(l) + 5*y(l).
Let j(g) = -g**3 + 4*g. Let m(k) = -2*k**3 + 5*k. Suppose 0 = -10*z + 8*z + 4. Determine z*m(s) - 3*j(s).
Let j(y) = 2*y**2 - y + 2. Let w(f) = -f**2. Let k(g) = -2*g**2 - 2*g + 2. Let d(q) = -k(q) + 4*w(q). Calculate -3*d(n) - 4*j(n).
Let c(m) = 6*m + 13. Let b(s) = 5*s + 12. Give 7*b(j) - 6*c(j).
Let y(l) = l**3 - 5*l + 1. Let t be (6/2 + -2)*-1. Let s(o) = -o. Give t*y(n) + 4*s(n).
Suppose -1 = -4*p + 23. Let o(c) = 2*c - c - 2*c. Let g(l) = -4*l + 1. Calculate p*o(j) - 2*g(j).
Let k(t) = 2 + t - 4*t + 15. Let i(u) = u - 6. Let l be (1 - -2)*(-4)/(-3). Calculate l*k(s) + 11*i(s).
Suppose o + o - 8 = 0. Let i(r) = 2*r**2 + 4*r. Let u(n) = -3*n + 2*n + 3*n + n + 2*n**2. What is o*i(d) - 5*u(d)?
Let o(r) = 5*r + 3. Let c(a) = 4*a + 2. Give -6*c(g) + 5*o(g).
Let d(r) be the third derivative of -r**5/60 - r**4/12 + r**3/3 - 8*r**2. Let z(a) = 4*a**2 + 7*a - 7. Determine -7*d(k) - 2*z(k).
Let m(r) = -r**3 - 2*r**2 + r + 1. Let s be m(-2). Let z(v) = 3*v**3 + v**2 + 3. Let d(j) = -j**3 - j**2 - j - 1. What is s*d(x) - z(x)?
Let z(s) = 0 + 4*s**2 - 1 - 2*s + s + 0. Let n(v) be the third derivative of -v**5/12 + v**4/12 + v**3/3 - v**2. Let t = -2 + 4. Calculate t*n(r) + 3*z(r).
Suppose 7 = 5*d + 2. Suppose 7 = -3*b + d. Let l(c) be the second derivative of -c**3/6 - c. Let r(q) = 2*q + 1. Calculate b*r(k) - 3*l(k).
Let w(y) = y**2 - 1. Let c(d) = -44*d**3 + 6*d**2 - 7. Calculate c(k) - 5*w(k).
Let u(s) = 2*s**3 + 1. Let q(j) = j**3 - j + 1. Determine -3*q(h) + u(h).
Let m(d) = 4*d + 37. Let o be m(-8). Let u(b) = -2*b**2 + 3*b + 5. Let s(l) = l**2 - l - 1. Determine o*s(r) + u(r).
Let v(a) = 10*a - 6. Let l(k) = 9*k - 7. Determine -3*l(n) + 4*v(n).
Let d(k) = 5*k**3 - 7*k - 6. Let h(z) = 14*z**3 - 20*z - 17. Let f(g) = 16*g - 4. Let x be f(8). Let c = x + -70. Suppose 3*t = -c + 3. What is t*d(v) + 6*h(v)?
Suppose -12 - 3 = -3*o. Let w(s) = -4*s**3 + 3*s - 2. Let v(a) = -9*a**3 + 7*a - 5. Calculate o*w(i) - 2*v(i).
Let h(z) = -z - 1. Let i(w) = -3*w - 4. Let x be (8 + 8/(-4))/1. What is x*h(c) - i(c)?
Let i(z) be the second derivative of -1/6*z**4 + 0 - z - 1/5*z**5 + 2*z**2 + 0*z**3. Let d(y) = -2*y**3 - y**2 + 2. Give -9*d(n) + 4*i(n).
Let n(p) = -16*p**2 + 2*p - 1. Let u(d) = 17*d**2 - 2*d. Calculate -2*n(i) - 3*u(i).
Let v(z) be the second derivative of -z**3/2 - 3*z. Suppose -3*h - 5*t = -4*h + 2, 5*h - 39 = -4*t. Let m(i) = 10*i. Determine h*v(p) + 2*m(p).
Let a(v) = -v - 1 + 5 + 6 - 1. Let u(x) be the third derivative of x**6/180 + x**5/30 + x**2. Let t(b) be the third derivative of u(b). Give -2*a(y) + 5*t(y).
Let v(p) = 5*p + 2. Let a(h) be the third derivative of h**4/12 + h**3/6 - 5*h**2. Give 11*a(f) - 4*v(f).
Let q be (-40)/(-7) - 6/(-21). Let h(f) = -f. Let y(v) = 9*v. Suppose 5 = -3*r + 8. Determine q*h(t) + r*y(t).
Let p(i) = -1. Let h(j) = 3*j - 12. Let c(q) = q**3 - 4*q**2 - 2*q + 3. Let x be c(3). What is x*p(w) + h(w)?
Let s(n) = n + 1. Let b(m) = -2*m - 1. Calculate 3*b(v) + 5*s(v).
Let n(s) be the third derivative of s**7/5040 - s**5/60 + 6*s**2. Let p(w) be the third derivative of n(w). Let m(j) = -j**2 + j. Determine -m(t) + p(t).
Let j(p) = 4*p + 7. Let f be -7*((-60)/21 - -2). Let o(v) = v. Let t(s) = 1. Suppose -2*z + 3*z - 1 = 0. Let i(a) = z*t(a) + o(a). Give f*i(l) - j(l).
Let a = -51 + 51. Let i(o) be the second derivative of a - o - 4*o**2 + 5/12*o**4 - 1/3*o**3. Let d(p) = -11*p**2 + 4*p + 17. Determine -6*d(l) - 13*i(l).
Let u = -3 + 5. Let f(c) be the first derivative of 3*c**2/2 + c - 8. Let p(a) = -4*a - 2. What is u*p(w) + 3*f(w)?
Let u(y) = -11*y - 3. Let b(d) = 6*d + 2. Suppose 0 = 2*q - 2, 10 = 3*m + 3*q - 14. What is m*b(a) + 4*u(a)?
Let r(d) = 42*d**3 - 8*d**2 - 8*d. Let o(k) = -k**2 - k. Determine 8*o(z) - r(z).
Let n(r) = -2*r**2 + 2*r - 2. Let i(x) = -5*x**2 + 4*x - 3. Determine 3*i(o) - 7*n(o).
Let f(p) be the first derivative of 2*p**2 + 2*p - 2. Let q(s) = s. Suppose -7*y = -11*y - 2*c + 2, 0 = 3*y - 2*c - 19. Calculate y*q(u) - f(u).
Let c(j) = -2*j**2 - 7*j + 4. Let y(s) = -6*s + 7. Let f(o) = -o**2 - o - 1. Let u(k) = -2*f(k) - y(k). Let r be (10/(-6))/(4/12). Determine r*u(m) - 6*c(m).
Let h be (-22)/2*(0 - 1). Let i(s) be the first derivative of 4*s**4 - 11*s**2/2 - 11*s + 1. Let a(q) = 3*q**3 - 2*q - 2. Let z = 0 - 2. Give h*a(r) + z*i(r).
Let j(o) = o**3 - o**2 + o. Let h(q) = 3*q**3 + q**2 - 4*q. Calculate h(g) + 2*j(g).
Let w(n) = 31*n**2 + 5. Let v(u) = 46*u**2 + 7. Calculate -5*v(o) + 7*w(o).
Let m(i) = 1428*i**3 + 84*i. Let r(b) = 84*b**3 + 5*b. Calculate 5*m(z) - 84*r(z).
Suppose x = -4*x. Let o(g) = -g**3 + x*g**3 - 1 + 1. Let v(m) = 2*m**3. Calculate 5*o(y) + 3*v(y).
Let s(g) = 7*g + 4. Let z(r) = -1 + 2 - 12*r + 0 + 13*r. Determine s(a) - 5*z(a).
Let z(p) = 4*p + 2*p - 6*p - p. Let h(c) = -3*c. What is -5*h(l) + 12*z(l)?
Let m(x) = -x**2 + 2*x + 3. Let a(c) be the second derivative of c**4/6 - 5*c**3/6 - 7*c**2/2 - c. Let f be -6*((-55)/(-15) - 4). Give f*a(y) + 5*m(y).
Let n(g) = 0*g + 6*g + 0*g - 3*g. Let l(t) = -4*t - 1. Determine 2*l(w) + 3*n(w).
Suppose 0 = 2*v + 4*u - 8, -3*v - 2*v - 3*u + 13 = 0. Suppose 5*y + 5*m = 3 - 13, v*y - m = 5. Let o(g) = -1. Let q(a) = a**2. Give y*o(j) + 2*q(j).
Let a(f) = -4*f**3 - 14*f**2 - 14*f + 24. Let o(z) = z**3 + 3*z**2 + 3*z - 5. Let w(r) = r - 8. Let h be w(6). Let p = h - 1. Determine p*a(i) - 14*o(i).
Let d = 3 - 6. Let u(q) = 4*q. Let v(s) = -s. Let y(x) = -2*u(x) - 5*v(x). Let a(b) = 3*b. What is d*a(i) - 2*y(i)?
Let l(b) = -5*b + 5. Let c(h) = h**3 + 20*h**2 + 21*h + 34. Let z be c(-19). Let t(j) = 14*j - 14. Calculate z*t(s) - 11*l(s).
Let u = 0 + 2. Let s(p) = 2*p - u*p + 3 + 2*p**2 + 2*p + 3*p**3. Let z(t) = t**3 + t**2 + t + 1. Let a = -5 + 3. Determine a*z(c) + s(c).
